title: Captain Grownup
description:
AT SOME POINT IN EVERY MAN'S LIFE, A YOUNG GIRL IS GOING TO GET HIM INTO TROUBLE
 Willard Michaels reached that point about the same time his wife kicked him out of their marriage, their life, and New Haven, and he began teaching English at a high school in the sticks.   In Michaels' case the trouble was plain, gum-chewing Susan Hinners.   All Michaels wanted to do was help Susan develop her remarkable literary talent. But he hadn't counted on her mad father, murderous brother, and man-eating sister…hadn't considered the explosive urges of an awakening teenager…
author: Kit Reed
